001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Mediator;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
006
007import java.util.*;
008
009/**
010 * Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
011 * <p>
012 * A neural network is modeled here as an extensible estimation strategy: it accepts
013 * inputs (features), transforms them through a series of layers composed of {@link Neuron}s
014 * and weighted connections, and produces outputs (predictions).
015 * </p>
016 */
017@Mediator
018public class DefaultNeuralNetwork implements NeuralNetwork {
019
020    private final List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers;
021    private final Map<Neuron, Pair<Integer, Integer>> positions;
022    private final Map<Neuron, List<Neuron>> connections;
023
024    /**
025     * Constructs a neural network for the provided layers.
026     *
027     * @param layers the layers of the neural network
028     */
029    public DefaultNeuralNetwork(List<List<? extends Neuron>> layers) {
030        this.layers = layers;
031        this.positions = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronPositions(layers);
032        this.connections = NeuralNetworks.getNeuronConnections(layers);
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * {@inheritDoc}
037     */
038    @Override
039    public int getWidth(int l) {
040        return layers.get(l).size();
041    }
042
043    /**
044     * {@inheritDoc}
045     */
046    @Override
047    public int getDepth() {
048        return layers.size() - 1;
049    }
050
051    /**
052     * {@inheritDoc}
053     */
054    @Override
055    public Neuron getNeuron(int l, int j) {
056        return layers.get(l).get(j);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * {@inheritDoc}
061     */
062    @Override
063    public <N extends Neuron> N getNeuron(int l, int j, Class<N> classType) {
064        return classType.cast(getNeuron(l, j));
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * {@inheritDoc}
069     */
070    @Override
071    public Map<Neuron, Float> getOutputConnections(int l, int j) {
072        Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j);
073        List<Neuron> connectedNeurons = connections.get(neuron);
074        Map<Neuron, Float> outputConnections = new IdentityHashMap<>();
075        if (connectedNeurons != null) {
076            for (Neuron connectedNeuron : connectedNeurons) {
077                outputConnections.put(connectedNeuron, connectedNeuron.getWeight(neuron));
078            }
079        }
080        return outputConnections;
081    }
082
083    /**
084     * {@inheritDoc}
085     */
086    @Override
087    public Set<Neuron> getTargetNeurons(Neuron neuron) {
088        List<Neuron> neurons = connections.get(neuron);
089        return neurons == null ? Set.of() : new HashSet<>(neurons);
090    }
091
092    /**
093     * {@inheritDoc}
094     */
095    @Override
096    public int getParameterCount() {
097        int parameterCount = 0;
098        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
099            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
100                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
101                    continue;
102                }
103                parameterCount += neuron.getParameterCount();
104            }
105        }
106        return parameterCount;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * {@inheritDoc}
111     */
112    @Override
113    public Float[] getParameters() {
114        Float[] parameters = new Float[getParameterCount()];
115        int i = 0;
116        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
117            for (Neuron neuron : layer) {
118                if (neuron instanceof InputNeuron) {
119                    continue;
120                }
121                Float[] neuronParameters = neuron.getParameters();
122                System.arraycopy(neuronParameters, 0, parameters, i, neuronParameters.length);
123            }
124        }
125        return parameters;
126    }
127
128    @Override
129    public Float getParameter(int p) {
130        return getParameters()[p];
131    }
132
133    @Override
134    public void setParameters(Float[] values) {
135        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
136    }
137
138    @Override
139    public void setParameter(int p, Float value) {
140        throw new UnsupportedOperationException();
141    }
142
143    @Override
144    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> getCurrentNumberType() {
145        return JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * {@inheritDoc}
150     */
151    @Override
152    public Float[] estimate(Float... inputs) {
153        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
154            layer.forEach(Neuron::deactivate);
155        }
156        for (int j = 0; j < inputs.length; j++) {
157            ((InputNeuron) layers.get(0).get(j)).setInputValue(inputs[j]);
158        }
159        for (List<? extends Neuron> layer : layers) {
160            layer.forEach(Neuron::activate);
161        }
162        List<? extends Neuron> outputLayer = layers.get(layers.size() - 1);
163        Float[] outputs = new Float[outputLayer.size()];
164        for (int j = 0; j < outputs.length; j++) {
165            outputs[j] = outputLayer.get(j).getOutput();
166        }
167        return outputs;
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * {@inheritDoc}
172     */
173    @Override
174    public int arity() {
175        return layers.get(0).size();
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * {@inheritDoc}
180     */
181    @Override
182    public int coArity() {
183        return layers.get(layers.size() - 1).size();
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Accepts a visitor to inspect the complete neural network
188     *
189     * @param visitor the visitor to apply to this network
190     */
191    @Override
192    public void accept(NeuronVisitor visitor) {
193        if (visitor == null) {
194            return;
195        }
196        visitor.enterNetwork(this);
197
198        int depth = getDepth();
199        for (int l = 1; l <= depth; l++) {
200            visitor.enterLayer(this, l);
201
202            int width = getWidth(l);
203            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
204                Neuron neuron = getNeuron(l, j, Neuron.class);
205                visitor.visitNeuron(this, neuron, l, j);
206
207                Map<Neuron, Float> outs = getOutputConnections(l, j);
208                if (outs != null) {
209                    for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> connection : outs.entrySet()) {
210                        Neuron target = connection.getKey();
211                        Pair<Integer, Integer> targetPosition = positions.get(target);
212                        visitor.visitConnection(this, neuron, l, j,
213                                target, targetPosition.left(), targetPosition.right(), connection.getValue());
214                    }
215                }
216            }
217
218            visitor.exitLayer(this, l);
219        }
220
221        visitor.exitNetwork(this);
222    }
223}
